name: Auto Approval Bot
description: An Advance Auto Approval Bot By @Snowball_Official

FORCE_SUB.description: ID of a Channel which you want to do Force Sub to use the bot. Example: -1001981748188

OWNER.description: Add Your User ID multiple is use space to split

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Bot Log Sending Channel (just create a private channel and add bot to admin and take channel id to add this variable) ⚠️ id startswith -100 must

DB_URL.description: Your Mongo DB URL Obtained From mongodb.com
